issue.title: [Python] parquet.read_table docstring wrong use_legacy_dataset explanation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9808](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9808). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
"Set to False to use the legacy behaviour."

<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/generated/pyarrow.parquet.read_pandas.html>

Think this should be "True" ? Since the read_table no longer uses legacy dataset as per: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9139
